about: I'm a Frontend developer with 3 years of experience. I don't have commercial development experience yet. To compensate this issue with my soft skills. I could join a team with a more experienced Frontend developer than me. My hard skills allow me to complete routine tasks when I work with React or React-typed frameworks.

projects.name: Workout log: Evil Plate
projects.description: There is a training diary for fitness trainings. Write your sport results when you complete an exercise in a gym. The app contains an indicator that shows you real-time result â€“ current tonnage. The value is the different between previous workout volume and current. It helps you to be confident that you have properly loaded muscles for their growth! Russian and English localizations.

projects.name: Interno
projects.description: Simple application (SPA) for home interior enjoyers. The app includes  landing page, projects gallery and simple blog with articles. User can visit the blog page and be able to select as multiple categories to sort articles. Same thing works for the project page but here we can pick only one category. To get more info about any project or read an article should go to right page with details.
